name: Autumn Wish
description:
Draw runes to cast spells, explore town, and be a gay mess of a witch in this narrative RPG visual novel!

Young witches Celia and Fen enjoy an evening full of magic and happiness together in town, but Celia finds herself wrestling with some complicated feelings and dangerous obstacles.  Explore the vibrant and magical world, get to know Celia and Fen, and have 100% definitely platonic conversations.  Plus, learn to cast spells and fight monsters with a drawing-based magic system!

This single-player game uses mouse and keyboard controls and lasts approximately 15 to 30 minutes.

This game is a sort of "proof of concept" and prequel for a larger game I hope to make at a later time, so I hope you enjoy a taste of this future project's possibilities!

Content Warning: Fantasy violence and danger, trans anxiety, loud noises
